query.statement:
SELECT MANDT , SEQNO , POSID , MATNR , MATNR_NM , SPEC , SHIPDAT , RTNDAT , ZQNTY , RTNTXT , MENGE , MEINS , ZCOST1 , ZCOST2 , (ZCOST1-ZCOST2) AS ZCOST3 , RTN_RSL , STATUS , BIGO , POST1 , '' AS CHECK , '' AS FLAG FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT147 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DLDAT = '00000000'
AND SHIPDAT BETWEEN #DAT_FM# AND #DAT_TO#
AND RTNDAT BETWEEN #DAT_FM# AND #DAT_TO#
AND POSID LIKE #POSID#||'%'
